courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a.courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a_a:
Jami 6 ta uchburchak chizishingiz kerak bo'ladi. Har bir uchburchakni tugatgandan so'ng, 60 daraja aylantiring va keyingi uchburchakni boshlash uchun harakat qiling.

![](https://images.code.org/ad6c6d98298df9f4e3cea5bbe5ec776e-image-1497476332024.2_solution2.gif)
courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a.courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a_b: Agar siz uchburchakni tsikl bilan yaratadigan bo'lsangiz, rassom ular boshlagan yo'l bilan qaragan bo'lishi kerak. Bu 60 daraja burilishni ancha osonlashtiradi.
courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a.courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a_c: Agar siz ranglarni xohlasangiz, kodingizdagi "set color" blokidan foydalaning. Shablon rasmidagi ranglarga mos kelishingiz shart emas.

courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a_2018.courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a_b: Agar siz uchburchakni tsikl bilan yaratadigan bo'lsangiz, rassom ular boshlagan yo'l bilan qaragan bo'lishi kerak. Bu 60 daraja burilishni ancha osonlashtiradi.
courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a_2018.courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a_c: Agar siz ranglarni xohlasangiz, kodingizdagi "set color" blokidan foydalaning. Shablon rasmidagi ranglarga mos kelishingiz shart emas.

courseD_artist_nestedLoops3.courseD_artist_nestedLoops3_a:
Bir kvadrat tepasidan keyingisini boshlaydigan joyga yetib borish uchun "oldinga sakrash" blokidan foydalanib ko'ring. 

 Agar sizning kvadratchalaringiz balandligi 20 piksel bo'lsa va ular bir-biridan 20 piksel bo'lsa, sizga qancha sakrash kerak?
courseD_artist_nestedLoops3.courseD_artist_nestedLoops3_b: Ushbu jumboqni tezda hal qilish uchun ichki tsikldan foydalanishni unutmang.
courseD_artist_nestedLoops3.courseD_artist_nestedLoops3_c: Bir kvadrat hosil qilish uchun "repeat" tsikli yordamida boshlang. Keyin, ushbu kvadratni 8 marta takrorlang va orasiga 40 piksel sakrab chiqing.

courseD_artist_nestedLoops_challenge2.courseD_artist_nestedLoops_challenge2_b: Kvadrat chizish uchun rassom 4 marta 90 daraja burish kerak.

courseD_artist_nestedLoops_challenge2_20.courseD_artist_nestedLoops_challenge2_a: Muntazam sakkizburchakni chizish uchun rassom 8 marta 45 daraja burish kerak.
courseD_artist_nestedLoops_challenge2_20.courseD_artist_nestedLoops_challenge2_b: Kvadrat chizish uchun rassom 4 marta 90 daraja burish kerak.

courseD_artist_ramp11.courseD_artist_ramp11a: Yon tomonni chizish uchun "100 pikselli oldinga siljish" blokidan foydalaning va 100 ni 200 ga o'zgartiring.
courseD_artist_ramp11.courseD_artist_ramp11b:
4 tomonni chizish uchun repeat tsiklining ichiga "200 piksel oldinga siljing" va tsikl 4 marta chiziladigan qilib o'rnatilganligiga ishonch hosil qiling. 

 Keyin burilishni unutmang!

courseD_artist_ramp12.courseD_artist_ramp12_a: Siz avval kvadratni, keyin uchburchakni chizishingiz yoki aksincha qilishingiz mumkin!
courseD_artist_ramp12.courseD_artist_ramp12_b: Muammoni 2 qismga ajratib ko'ring va 2 tsikldan foydalaning.

courseD_bee_conditionals6.courseD_bee_conditionals6_hintVid1: Boshlashda yordam kerakmi? Videoni tomosha qiling!
courseD_bee_conditionals6.courseD_bee_conditionals6_a: Har bir bulut ostida asalari ini mavjudligini tekshirish uchun "if" iborasidan foydalanganingizga ishonch hosil qiling.
courseD_bee_conditionals6.courseD_bee_conditionals6_b: Bunday holda, bulutlar ostida gullarni tekshirishning hojati yo'q.
courseD_bee_conditionals6.courseD_bee_conditionals6_c: Kodingizni soddalashtirish uchun foydalanishingiz mumkin bo'lgan tsikl bormi?
courseD_bee_conditionals6.courseD_bee_conditionals6_hintVid2: Ushbu jumboqni yechishda yordam olish uchun ushbu videoni tomosha qiling.

courseD_bee_conditionals7.courseD_bee_conditionals7_hintVid1: Boshlashda yordam kerakmi? Videoni tomosha qiling!
courseD_bee_conditionals7.courseD_bee_conditionals7_a:
\*\* Esingizda bo'lsin: \*\* Ushbu jumboq har safar ishlatilganda o'zgarib turadi.  

Muammoni hal qilish uchun siz shartli blokdan foydalanishni xohlaysiz ("if / else").
courseD_bee_conditionals7.courseD_bee_conditionals7_b: Agar bulut ostida gul bo'lmasa, unda asalari ini bo'lishi kerak, shuning uchun bo'sh joy haqida o'ylashning hojati yo'q.
courseD_bee_conditionals7.courseD_bee_conditionals7_hintVid2: Ushbu jumboqni yechishda yordam olish uchun ushbu videoni tomosha qiling.

courseD_bee_conditionals7_predict2.courseD_bee_conditionals7_a:
\*\* Esingizda bo'lsin: \*\* Ushbu jumboq har safar ishlatilganda o'zgarib turadi.  

Muammoni hal qilish uchun siz shartli blokdan foydalanishni xohlaysiz ("if / else").

courseD_bee_conditionals8.courseD_bee_conditionals8_hintVid1: Boshlashda yordam kerakmi? Videoni tomosha qiling!
courseD_bee_conditionals8.courseD_bee_conditionals8_a: \*\* Esingizda bo‘lsin: \*\* Ushbu boshqotirma har safar ishlatilganda o‘zgarib turadi. Muammoni hal qilish uchun siz shartli bo‘lakdan foydalanishingiz kerak (`if` yoki `if/else`).
courseD_bee_conditionals8.courseD_bee_conditionals8_b:
Ushbu boshqotirma juda chalg‘itadigan turidan, chunki bitta shartli ifoda bilan bo‘sh kvadratlar, nektar va asalni mavjudligini tekshirib bo‘lmaydi.

  Faqat yo‘lingiz oxirida nektar va asal mavjudligini tekshiring.
courseD_bee_conditionals8.courseD_bee_conditionals8_c: Qanday qilib yo'l qancha uzoq bo'lishidan qat'i nazar, har bir yo'lni oxirigacha sayohat qilishingizga ishonch hosil qilishingiz mumkin?
courseD_bee_conditionals8.courseD_bee_conditionals8_d:
Sizning oldingizda bulut bo'lsa ham, avval unga tashrif buyurishingiz shart emas. Kvadratning pastki o'ng qismida bulutdan boshlang.

![](https://images.code.org/166e71553edf23bf13ecd290a8e7e721-image-1501013509361.09.09.png)
courseD_bee_conditionals8.courseD_bee_conditionals8_hintVid2: Ushbu jumboqni yechishda yordam olish uchun ushbu videoni tomosha qiling.

courseD_bee_conditionals_challenge1.courseD_bee_conditionals_challenge1_a: Hech bir daraxtga urmasdan har bir gul va asalga yetadigan yo'lni topa olasizmi? Eng yaxshi yo'l spiraldir.
courseD_bee_conditionals_challenge1.courseD_bee_conditionals_challenge1_b: Ushbu jumboqda har bir bo'shliqda gul, asalari ini yoki hech narsa bo'lishi mumkin. Demak, har bir kvadrat bo'yicha siz "if / else" shartini takrorlashingiz mumkin.

courseD_bee_conditionals_challenge2.courseD_bee_conditionals_challenge1_b:
Xuddi "if at flower" bloklari singari,"while nectar> 0 " ichidagi kod faqat ari gulda bo'lganida ishlaydi. Farqi shundaki, ichkaridagi kod nektar qolmaguncha qayta-qayta ishlaydi. Ushbu namunani sinab ko'ring:

<xml>  <block type="bee_whileNectarAmount">
    <title name="ARG1">nectarRemaining</title>
    <title name="OP">></title>
    <title name="ARG2">0</title>                    <statement name="DO">
                      <block type="maze_nectar"/>
                    </statement>
  </block></xml>

courseD_bee_debugging_challenge1a.courseD_bee_debugging_challenge1_a: Dasturning birinchi yarmi nimaga ishlamoqda? Asalari nima sababdan orgaqag harakat qilishi kerakligi haqida o‘ylab ko‘ring. U har safar gul ustidan yurganda qancha nektar asal yig‘adi?
courseD_bee_debugging_challenge1a.courseD_bee_debugging_challenge1_b: Ushbu jumboqni hal qilish uchun asalarilar nektar yig'ishda qilgan namunaga asalini yasash uchun rioya qilishlarini so'rang.
courseD_bee_debugging_challenge1a.courseD_bee_debugging_challenge1_c:
Ari pastki qatordan o'tgandan so'ng, quyidagi buyruqlarni takrorlang:

<xml><block type="controls_repeat">
                    <title name="TIMES">2</title>
                    <statement name="DO">
                      <block type="maze_move">
                        <title name="DIR">moveForward</title>
                        <next>
                          <block type="maze_honey"/>
                        </next>
                      </block>
                    </statement>
                    <next>
                      <block type="maze_move">
                        <title name="DIR">moveBackward</title>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block></xml>

courseD_collector_nested_loops_challenge.courseD_collector_nested_loops_challenge: Bitta buyruqni yoki uzunroq buyruqlarni `takrorlash`ingiz mumkinligini unutmang. Hatto `takrorlash` kod bo‘lagini boshqa `takrorlash` kod bo‘lagini bilan takrorlashingiz mumkin!
To'rt marvaridni ikkitasini olish uchun zarur bo'lgandan ko'ra ko'proq bloklardan foydalanmasdan qanday qilib olish mumkinligini aniqlay olasizmi?

courseD_collector_ramp10.courseD_artist_ramp10_a:
Har bir tomon uchun to'rtta "oldinga siljish" bloklarini ishlatish o'rniga "repeat" tsikli ichiga bitta "oldinga siljish" blokini qo'yib ko'ring: 

 <xml><block type="controls_repeat">
                                            <title name="TIMES">4</title>
                                            <statement name="DO">
                                              <block type="maze_moveForward"/>
                                            </statement>
                                          </block></xml>
courseD_collector_ramp10.courseD_artist_ramp10_b: Bitta xazinani yig'ishni, so'ng maydonning yangi tomonidan boshlashni unutmang!
courseD_collector_ramp10.courseD_artist_ramp10_c: Agar siz kodingizni soddalashtirmoqchi bo'lsangiz, bitta repeat tsiklini boshqasining ichiga qo'yishingiz mumkin! Bunga \*\* ichki tsikl \*\* deyiladi.

courseD_collector_ramp8.courseD_collector_ramp8_a: Xazinali maydonga kelganingizda, uni yig'ish uchun "collect" dan foydalaning. Ushbu jumboq uchun siz xazinani bir necha bor to'plashingiz kerak bo'ladi!
courseD_collector_ramp8.courseD_collector_ramp8_b: Agar siz kodingizni soddalashtirmoqchi bo‘lsangiz, bitta siklni ikkinchisining ichiga qo‘yishingiz mumkin! Bu **nested loop** (ichki sikl) deb ataladi.

courseD_collector_ramp9.courseD_collector_ramp9_a: Laurelni birinchi xazina tomon harakatlantirishni boshlang, so'ng uni to'plang. Ikkinchi to'plamni olish uchun ushbu ketma-ketlikni takrorlay olasizmi?
courseD_collector_ramp9.courseD_collector_ramp9_b: Agar siz kodingizni soddalashtirmoqchi bo'lsangiz, bitta repeat tsiklini boshqasining ichiga qo'yishingiz mumkin! Bunga \*\*ichki tsikl \*\* deyiladi.

outbreak1.step1:
Sprayt yaratish uchun ushbu bloklardan foydalaning:

<xml><block type="gamelab_makeNumSprites">
      <title name="ANIMATION_NAME">"healthy"</title>
      <value name="NUM">
        <block type="math_number">
          <title name="NUM">10</title>
        </block>
      </value>
    </block></xml>

<xml><block type="gamelab_makeNumSprites">
      <title name="ANIMATION_NAME">"sick"</title>
      <value name="NUM">
        <block type="math_number">
          <title name="NUM">1</title>
        </block>
      </value>
    </block></xml>

Ushbu blok asboblar qutisining \*\* Sprites \*\* toifasida joylashgan.
outbreak1.step2:
Spraytlarning o'lchamini ushbu blok bilan o'zgartiring:  <xml><block type="gamelab_setProp"><title name="PROPERTY">"scale"</title><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_getAllSprites"/></value><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><title name="NUM">50</title></block></value></block></xml>.

U asboblar qutisining \*\* Amallar \*\* toifasida joylashgan.
outbreak1.step3:
Barcha spraytni aylanib yurdirishni boshlang: <xml><block type="gamelab_addBehaviorSimple" uservisible="false"><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_getAllSprites"></block></value><value name="BEHAVIOR"><block type="gamelab_behavior_get"><mutation></mutation><title name="VAR">wandering</title></block></value></block></xml>.

Ushbu blok asboblar qutisining \*\* Amallar \*\* toifasida joylashgan.

outbreak2.hint1:
Hodisalar blokidagi "+" tugmasini bosing. "Kostyumni o'zgartirish" blokidagi bo'sh joyni ichidagi "mavzu" bloki bilan to'ldiring.

<xml><block type="gamelab_checkTouching"><title name="CONDITION">"when"</title><value name="SPRITE1"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"healthy"</title></block></value><value name="SPRITE2"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"sick"</title></block></value><next><block type="gamelab_setAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"sick"</title><value name="THIS"><block type="gamelab_subjectSpritePointer"></block></value></block></next></block></xml>

outbreak3.hint1:
Monstrlar niqobini berish uchun "kostyumni o'zgartirish" bloki va "bosilganda" tadbiridan foydalaning:

<xml><block type="gamelab_spriteClicked"><title name="CONDITION">"when"</title><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"healthy"</title></block></value><next><block type="gamelab_setAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"healthy_mask"</title></block></next></block></xml>

Kichik qizil "bosilgan" blokini ham olib borishni unutmang!
outbreak3.hint2:
Ushbu darajadagi yangi kod quyidagicha ko'rinishi kerak:

<xml><block type="gamelab_spriteClicked"><title name="CONDITION">"when"</title><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"healthy"</title></block></value><next><block type="gamelab_setAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"healthy_mask"</title><value name="THIS"><block type="gamelab_clickedSpritePointer"></block></value></block></next></block><block type="gamelab_spriteClicked"><title name="CONDITION">"when"</title><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"sick"</title></block></value><next><block type="gamelab_setAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"sick_mask"</title><value name="THIS"><block type="gamelab_clickedSpritePointer"></block></value></block></next></block></xml>

outbreak4.challenge:
## Qo'shimcha topshiriq xphlaysizmi?

Bundan tashqari, siz monstrlarni tezroq yoki sekinroq harakatga keltirishingiz mumkin.

1.  Ushbu blokdagi "Tahrirlash" tugmasini bosing <xml><block type="gamelab_behavior_get"><mutation></mutation><title name="VAR">wandering</title></block></xml>
2.  Ushbu blokdagi raqamni oshirish yoki kamaytirish:

 <xml><block type="gamelab_moveForward"><value name="SPRITE"><block type="sprite_parameter_get"><title name="VAR">this sprite</title></block></value><value name="DISTANCE"><block type="math_number"><title name="NUM">1</title></block></value></block>
</xml>

Monstrlar sekinroq harakatlanishi uchun "0,5" yoki "0,25" kabi kasr sonini tanlang. Ularni tezroq harakatlantirish uchun 1 dan kattaroq raqamni tanlang.

outbreak5.solution2:
Yangi kodingiz bu kabi bo'lishi kerak:

<xml><block type="gamelab_checkTouching">
    <title name="CONDITION">"when"</title>
    <value name="SPRITE1">
      <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation">
        <title name="ANIMATION">"healthy"</title>
      </block>
    </value>
    <value name="SPRITE2">
      <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation">
        <title name="ANIMATION">"sick"</title>
      </block>
    </value>
    <next>
      <block type="gamelab_setAnimation">
        <title name="ANIMATION">"sick"</title>
        <value name="THIS">
          <block type="gamelab_subjectSpritePointer"></block>
        </value>
        <next>
          <block type="gamelab_addBehaviorSimple">
            <value name="SPRITE">
              <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation">
                <title name="ANIMATION">"sick"</title>
              </block>
            </value>
            <value name="BEHAVIOR">
              <block type="gamelab_behavior_get">
                <mutation></mutation>
                <title name="VAR" id="recovering">recovering</title>
              </block>
            </value>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </next>
  </block></xml>

outbreak7.whenclicked:
## Vaksinalar

Siz ularni bosganingizda monstrlar uchun emlashni simulyatsiya qilishingiz mumkin. Buning uchun ushbu hodisa bilan "kostyumni o'zgartirish" blokidan foydalaning:

<xml><block type="gamelab_spriteClicked">
      <title name="CONDITION">"when"</title>
      <value name="SPRITE">
        <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation">
          <title name="ANIMATION">"healthy_mask"</title>
        </block>
      </value>
    </block></xml>
outbreak7.verionhistory: O'zingizni qotib qolgandek his qilyapsizmi? Siz har doim quyida joylashgan "Versiya tarixi" tugmachasini bosgan holda "Qayta boshlash"-ni tanlab, kodingizni tiklashingiz mumkin.

outbreak6.hint2:
Boshqa "harakat" bloklarini "if chance" blokining ichki qismiga o'tkazganingizga ishonch hosil qiling:

<xml><block type="gamelab_checkTouching">
    <title name="CONDITION">"when"</title>
    <value name="SPRITE1">
      <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation">
        <title name="ANIMATION">"healthy"</title>
      </block>
    </value>
    <value name="SPRITE2">
      <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation">
        <title name="ANIMATION">"sick"</title>
      </block>
    </value>
    <next>
      <block type="gamelab_withPercentChance">
        <value name="NUM">
          <block type="math_number">
            <title name="NUM">90</title>
          </block>
        </value>
        <statement name="STATEMENT">
          <block type="gamelab_setAnimation">
            <title name="ANIMATION">"sick"</title>
            <value name="THIS">
              <block type="gamelab_subjectSpritePointer"></block>
            </value>
            <next>
          <block type="gamelab_addBehaviorSimple">
            <value name="SPRITE">
              <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation">
                <title name="ANIMATION">"sick"</title>
              </block>
            </value>
            <value name="BEHAVIOR">
              <block type="gamelab_behavior_get">
                <mutation></mutation>
                <title name="VAR" id="recovering">recovering</title>
              </block>
            </value>
          </block>
        </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </next>
  </block>
</xml>

Sog'lom va yuqtirilgan spraytlar o'rtasidagi "teginish"ning barcha mumkin bo'lgan kombinatsiyalarini tekshirish uchun yana 3 ta `when touches` hodisasini qo'shishingiz kerak.

<xml><block type="gamelab_checkTouching">
      <title name="CONDITION">"when"</title>
      <value name="SPRITE1">
        <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation">
          <title name="ANIMATION">"healthy_mask"</title>
        </block>
      </value>
      <value name="SPRITE2">
        <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation">
          <title name="ANIMATION">"sick"</title>
        </block>
      </value>
    </block><block type="gamelab_checkTouching">
      <title name="CONDITION">"when"</title>
      <value name="SPRITE1">
        <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation">
          <title name="ANIMATION">"healthy"</title>
        </block>
      </value>
      <value name="SPRITE2">
        <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation">
          <title name="ANIMATION">"sick_mask"</title>
        </block>
      </value>
    </block><block type="gamelab_checkTouching">
      <title name="CONDITION">"when"</title>
      <value name="SPRITE1">
        <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation">
          <title name="ANIMATION">"healthy_mask"</title>
        </block>
      </value>
      <value name="SPRITE2">
        <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation">
          <title name="ANIMATION">"sick_mask"</title>
        </block>
      </value>
    </block></xml>

Har bir yo'l o'rtasida Sharqqa ikki marta harakatlaning.

<xml>

courseB_collector_loops_challenge1.courseB_collector_loops_challenge1_b:
Quyidagi buyruqlarni sikllashtirish bilan boshlang:

<xml>
  <block type="maze_moveSouth">
    <next>
    <block type="collector_collect"></block>
    </next>
    </block>
</xml>
courseB_collector_loops_challenge1.courseB_collector_loops_challenge1_c:
Har bir yo'l o'rtasida Sharqqa ikki marta harakatlaning.

<xml>
  <block type="maze_moveEast"><next>
  <block type="maze_moveEast"></block></next></block>
  </xml>

Buni faqat 14 ta blok bilan qilish kerak. Yechimni ko'rish uchun yana bir marta maslahat tugmasini bosing.
courseB_collector_loops_challenge1.courseB_collector_loops_challenge1_d:
Buni sinab ko'ring!

<xml>
  <block type="when_run" deletable="false" movable="false">
    <next>
      <block type="controls_repeat_simplified">
        <title name="TIMES">5</title>
        <statement name="DO">
          <block type="maze_moveSouth">
            <next>
              <block type="collector_collect"/>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
        <next>
          <block type="maze_moveEast">
            <next>
              <block type="maze_moveEast">
                <next>
                  <block type="controls_repeat_simplified">
                    <title name="TIMES">5</title>
                    <statement name="DO">
                      <block type="collector_collect">
                        <next>
                          <block type="maze_moveNorth"/>
                        </next>
                      </block>
                    </statement>
                    <next>
                      <block type="maze_moveEast">
                        <next>
                          <block type="maze_moveEast">
                            <next>
                              <block type="controls_repeat_simplified">
                                <title name="TIMES">5</title>
                                <statement name="DO">
                                  <block type="maze_moveSouth">
                                    <next>
                                      <block type="collector_collect"/>
                                    </next>
                                  </block>
                                </statement>
                              </block>
                            </next>
                          </block>
                        </next>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </next>
  </block>
</xml>
